user.biography:
Prestige watchmaking since 1775. 
Founded by Abraham-Louis Breguet, the innovator.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on September 07, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch and text that says 'V 12 1 11 R EGUET E 10 9 S WISS GUILLOCH'.

node.text:
The new Tradition 7035 is a limited edition of 88 timepieces, which is the first of the collection to be enhanced with the snow-setting technique. The 18-carat gold chosen for the dial, plate and bridges are therefore all set with different-sized diamonds in order to keep the visible material to a minimum. Another subtle detail is the retrograde seconds indicator made of a gradient of rubies and pink sapphires.

Discover : link in bio.
#BreguetNovelties #BreguetTradition #ref7035 #BreguetLimitedEdition

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on September 07, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch and text that says 'V 12 1 11 R EGUET E 10 9 S WISS GUILLOCH'.
Photo by Montres Breguet on September 07, 2021.
Photo by Montres Breguet on September 07, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on September 04, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
There are many eye-catching details on the new Tradition 7035. One particularity, which is common to the whole collection, would certainly be its movement featured on the dial, allowing its owner to dive into the mechanism. Breguet chose to enhance this sparking novelty with the art of jewellery, by using the refined snow-setting technique. 

Discover : link in bio. 
#BreguetNovelties #BreguetTradition #ref7035 #BreguetLimitedEdition

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on September 04, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on September 04, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on September 02, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The House of Breguet lifts the veil on a sparkling new variation from his workshops, the Tradition 7035. While bearing all the hallmarks of the collection it is joining, it is also enhanced by the finesse of jewellery, and the snow-setting technique more exactly. This novelty in rose gold is a limited edition of 88 timepieces. 
Learn more : link in bio.
#BreguetNovelties #BreguetTradition #ref7035 #BreguetLimitedEdition

Photo by Montres Breguet on August 31, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
From the simplest to the most complicated model, Breguet is attentive to every singly detail of its timepieces. On the Classique Tourbillon 3358 featuring an engine-turned mother-of-pearl dial, the spectacle continues at the back with a finely hand-engraved movement. 

Discover our collections : link in bio
#BreguetClassique #ref3358 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 28, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Further to enrich its Classique 3358 with an engine-turned mother-of-pearl dial, Breguet adds another touch of refinement by setting the bezel and the horst with diamonds. 

Discover our collections : link in bio
#BreguetClassique #ref3358 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 26, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch and text that says 'BREGUET 5025 a 9 10 3 9 8 5 ው'.

node.text:
On the Classique 3358, Breguet choose to combine a pure mechanical complication like the Tourbillon, with a dial in gold and mother-of-pearl, featuring a very subtle engine-turned motif. 

Discover our collections : link in bio
#BreguetClassique #ref3358 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 24, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The Marine 5887 notably indicates the equation of time, the difference between mean solar time, corresponding to civil or standard hours and minutes, and true solar time, meaning the actual solar hours and minutes. To do so our watchmakers developed a special cam, shaped like a bean, reproducing the variations between both times, as they are repeated in an identical manner on the same dates over the year.

Discover our collections : link in bio.
#BreguetMarine #EquationofTime #ref5887 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 24, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 24, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 21, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
Visible through a sapphire caseback, the bridges of the Marine Équation Marchante Tourbillon 5887 have been delicately chased to depict in meticulous detail the Royal Louis, a first rank vessel in the French Royal Navy. The barrel is adorned with a windrose motif, in reference to astronomical navigation. Thanks to the carefully chosen positioning of the oscillating weight on the rim of the calibre, the self-winding movement deploys the full splendour of its decoration. 

Discover our collections : link in bio.
#BreguetMarine #EquationofTime #ref5887 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 21, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 21, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 19, 2021. May be an image of wrist watch.

node.text:
The Marine Équation Marchante Tourbillon 5887 flaunts no less than three noteworthy complications: a Tourbillon, a perpetual calendar and the equation of time. The latter is among the rarest and most fascinating in watchmaking. It serves to display the difference between mean solar time, corresponding to civil or standard hours and minutes, and true solar time, meaning the actual solar hours and minutes.

Discover our collections : link in bio.
#BreguetMarine #EquationofTime #ref5887 #BreguetTourbillon #Tourbillon

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021.

node.text:
The requirements for fine anglage are strict. Notwithstanding the varying shapes of the components edges, the rounding should be even throughout. Irregularities, flat spots, distortion of curves are all unacceptable. Most of all the edges should display a clean bright polish, done in a way to maximise brilliance. Considered by anyone else to be a complex finish to achieve, although commonly recognised, anglage has been raised to the rank of an art form at Breguet.

Learn more : link in bio.
#Anglage #Craftmanship #BreguetWatchmaking

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021. May be an image of 1 person.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 17, 2021. May be an image of saddle-stitched leather.
Photo by Montres Breguet on August 13, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
There are many challenges in creating a perfect anglage finish, even with the simplest of forms, but increase geometrically as the shape of the component becomes more complex. Consider for a moment the panoply of shapes at the disposal of watchmakers as they craft the bridges, plates, cams and levers of different movements: straight edges, sharp exterior corners, rounded bombée edges, sharp interior corners. The palate is essentially endless, limited only by the imaginations of the movement designers. 
Learn more : link in bio
#Anglage #Craftmanship #BreguetWatchmaking

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Montres Breguet on August 12, 2021.

node.text:
Anglage is one of the most exacting and intricate finishes to apply. The description sounds simple: rounding and polishing the edge of a movement bridge or other component. There are multiple purposes that underlie application of anglage. First and foremost is the elimination of smudges and burs remaining after a part has been machined. Not only are these "left overs" from the cutting of the component unappealing in appearance, they are prime sites for corrosion to begin.
Learn more : link in bio.
#Anglage #Craftmanship #BreguetWatchmaking
